com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin

Class AdminContentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin.AdminContentController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class AdminContentController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView objects and object of Content class or subclasses for admins. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Article, Category, Section, Company, ArticleService, CategoryService, SectionService, CompanyService, AdminMVFabric

      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Category class.
      private CompanyService companyService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Company class.
      private CacheMVFabric fabric
      The implementation of the interface provides a set of standard methods for creates and returns the main modelAndViews for admins.
      private static org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView
      Temp object.

      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Photo class.
      private SectionService sectionService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Section class.
      private VideoService videoService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Video class.

        categoryService - a implementation of the CategoryService interface.
        sectionService - a implementation of the SectionService interface.
        fileService - a implementation of the PhotoService interface.
        videoService - a implementation of the VideoService interface.

      • addArticle

        @Transactional
 @RequestMapping(value="/article/add",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addArticle(@RequestParam(value="title")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="text")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String text,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="keywords")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String keywords,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="number")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String number,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="category_url")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String categoryUrl,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="main_photo")
                                                                                                                                                     org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile mainFile,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="slides[]")
                                                                                                                                                     org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] slideFiles,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="video_urls")
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String videoUrls,
                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam(value="is_valid")
                                                                                                                                                     boolean isValid,
                                                                                                                                                     org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Adds new article and redirects by url /admin/article/{url}. Request mapping: /admin/article/add Method: POST
        Parameters:
        title - a title of the new article.
        description - a description of the new article.
        text - a text of the new article.
        keywords - a keywords of the new article.
        number - a number of the new article.
        categoryUrl - a category url of the new article.
        mainFile - a file of main file to the new article.
        slideFiles - a files of slides to the new article.
        videoUrls - a category url of the new article.
        isValid - a validated of the new article.
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
        Article, Category, Photo

      • addArticle

        @RequestMapping(value="/article/add",
                method=GET)
public void addArticle()
                                                                                    throws org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException
        The method throws an exception in the case of reference to it. The exception sender: "GET method in "/admin/article/add" is not supported!" Request mapping: /admin/article/add Method: POST
        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException - thrown when an error occurs reading the mapping between object and datastore.

      • updateArticle

        @Transactional
 @RequestMapping(value="/article/update",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateArticle(@RequestParam(value="url")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String url,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="title")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String title,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="text")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String text,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="keywords")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String keywords,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="number")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String number,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="category_url")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String categoryUrl,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="main_photo")
                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile mainFile,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="photo_action")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String photoAction,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="slides[]")
                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] slideFiles,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="slides_action")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String slidesAction,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="video_urls")
                                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String videoUrls,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="is_valid")
                                                                                                                                                           boolean isValid,
                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Updates and save the article with url and redirects by url /admin/article/{url}. Request mapping: /admin/article/update Method: POST
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the article to update.
        title - a new title to the article.
        description - a new description to the article.
        text - a new text to the article.
        keywords - a new keywords to the article.
        number - a new number to the article.
        categoryUrl - a category url of the article.
        mainFile - a file of main file to the article.
        photoAction - a action on the main file.
        slideFiles - a files of slides to the article.
        slidesAction - a action on the slides.
        videoUrls - a category url of the article.
        isValid - a validated of the article.
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
        Article, Category, Photo
